
```{r Five-number_Summary}
summary(M1)
# Summary statistics
```

```{r outlier_count}
# Extract 5-number summary
q1 <- quantile(M1$PctMinority, 0.25, names = FALSE)
q3 <- quantile(M1$PctMinority, 0.75, names = FALSE)
IQR_1<-IQR(M1$PctMinority)
# Compute IQR
low1<-as.numeric(q1-1.5*IQR_1)
high1<-as.numeric(q3+1.5*IQR_1)
# Calculate fences
outlier_M1<-M1$PctMinority[M1$PctMinority<low1|M1$PctMinority>high1]
# Identify outliers
```

``` {r boxplot_verify_if_exit_outlier}
b1<-boxplot(M1$PctMinority, main="Minority % by State")
# Draw boxplot
Out_verify1<-boxplot.stats(M1$PctMinority)$out
# Verify outliers with boxplot.stats()
```
